name: Top Speed! Wheelchair Coming Through
description:
Top Speed! Wheelchair Coming Through is a short physics based wheelchair arcade game. The rules are fairly simple: You are someone in a wheelchair, and you must get from the starting line to the finish line to beat the level.

But no one said being in a wheelchair is easy...

A Wheelchair Simulator - At least to some extent. Every spin of the wheel matters and behaves the way you would expect from a wheelchair.

Challenging Levels - No level is impossible, some will just be really difficult.

Highscore Leaderboards - For self improvement, friendly rivalries and hardcore speedrunners.

While supporting keyboard, this game should be played using a Gamepad (Xbox, Playstation 4 or Switch Pro controller).

Although free, supporting the prototype through comments, ratings or donations will be a strong incentive to release it in the future as a full game. So if you wish to see more content, graphics, levels, polish and more, consider donating, everything helps.
